Calamity_Jane_(country_music_band):
{{short description|American country music band}} {{Infobox musical artist | name = Calamity Jane | image = | origin = United States | genre = [[Country music|Country]] | years_active = 1981â€“1982 | label = [[Columbia Records|Columbia Nashville]] | spinoffs = [[Kennedy Rose]] | past_members = Mary Fielder
[[Mary Ann Kennedy (American singer)|Mary Ann Kennedy]]
Linda Moore
[[Pam Rose]] }} '''Calamity Jane''' was an American all-female [[country music]] band composed of Mary Fielder (guitar), Mary Ann Kennedy (drums), Linda Moore (bass guitar) and Pam Rose (lead vocals). The band recorded for [[Columbia Records]] between 1981 and 1982, charting four times on the ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]'' Hot Country Singles (now [[Hot Country Songs]]) charts, including the No. 44 "I've Just Seen a Face" (by Lennon- McCartney from The Beatles) from 1982.{{cite book|last=Whitburn|first=Joel|title=Hot Country Songs 1944 to 2008|publisher=Record Research, Inc.|year=2008|pages=74|isbn=978-0-89820-177-2}} Prior to the quartet's foundation, Rose had been a solo recording artist on [[Capitol Records|Capitol]] and [[Epic Records]].{{cite book|last=Whitburn|first=Joel|title=Hot Country Songs 1944 to 2008|publisher=Record Research, Inc.|year=2008|pages=363|isbn=978-0-89820-177-2}} After 1982, Kennedy and Rose split from the band and formed a singing-songwriting duo called [[Kennedy Rose]], writing hits for [[Restless Heart]], [[Lee Greenwood]], and [[Martina McBride]] in addition to recording two albums for [[IRS Records]].{{cite web |author=Jason Ankeny |title=Kennedy Rose biography |url={{AllMusic|class=artist|id=p1678/biography|pure_url=yes}} |work=[[Allmusic]] |accessdate=2009-10-07}} ==Discography== ===Albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! style="width:14em;"| Title ! style="width:18em;"| Details |- ! scope="row"| ''Calamity Jane'' | * Release date: 1982 * Label: [[Columbia Records]] * Format: [[LP record|LP]], [[Compact Cassette|cassette]] |} ===Singles=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! rowspan="2"| Year ! rowspan="2" style="width:14em;"| Single !
